original_text: Then the king of the north will return to his own country. He will take many valuable things with him. As he returns, he will cause trouble for the people who obey God's covenant. He will do whatever he wants to do against them. Then he will continue his journey back to his own country.
korean_text: 북방 왕은 많은 재물을 가지고 본국으로 돌아가리니 그는 마음으로 언약을 거스르며 자기 마음대로 행하고 본토로 돌아갈 것이며

sentences.original_text: Then the king of the north will return to his own country
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 북방 왕은 자기 나라로 돌아갈 것입니다

sentences.original_text: He will take many valuable things with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 많은 귀중한 것들을 가지고 갈 것입니다

sentences.original_text: he will cause trouble for the people who obey God's covenant
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 하나님의 언약을 순종하는 사람들에게 고통을 줄 것입니다

sentences.original_text: He will do whatever he wants to do against them
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들에게 하고 싶은 모든 것을 할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Then he will continue his journey back to his own country
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그는 자기 나라로 돌아가는 여정을 계속할 것입니다
